title: For X-mas I wanted Fiora's ult back...
body:
Maybe next year huh Riot?

I've been a very good boy.

replies.body: Old Fiora ult was not a good game mechanic.  It did not have counterplay and it would be even worse these days with {{item:3812}} in the game.  Being able to go untargettable while still dealing massive physical damage to enemies would be really unhealthy.

Do you think any of you can talk to ME about game mechanics with Fiora?


I was the greatest...  Fiora..  of... all...  time. 

Riot ruined my champ and banned me from ranked at the same time. 

I want my champ back. 

If you were going to make a new one give her a new name.

Don't ruin my champ Riot and act like you didn't screw Fiora up good.

Don't talk to me like you know jack about Fiora. 

I play her every single day.

I'm the best Fiora not you.

Don't pretend like you know anything about her.

2 things.

1)  Calm yo ass down.  You posted on the boards, that is where you post for community interaction.  If you have something to discuss personally with Riot then that is what support tickets are for.

2)  True, I might not play a lot of Fiora before or after.  However that does not mean that A) I don't know about game balance/health.  I work in the video game industry, you pick up a few things.  Me not playing her as much does not mean I am not aware of the issues her kit caused in terms of game balance. B)  While I might not be a big Fiora player, I do know where you are coming from.  I am a Taric main, and was long before he got reworked.  His rework changed his entire role as a champion and the style you play him in, far more so than Fiora.  So I do understand how you feel.  That feeling does not give you the excuse to throw a tantrum and be rude to others.

It is a reason to feel upset, but not to be unreasonable.
Why do you need that toxic kit back?

Actually the new ult is better in this meta.
Like how are you going to kill off a poppy? Only fiora can do it naturally.
